short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears your app cache and browsing data with a click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NEW UPDATE: Clear Cache v2 with new UI and features!

What's new in this update:
1. Revamped UI
2. Dark and Light Mode.
3. More data clearing features.

Delete browsing data directly from the browser toolbar. Clear cookies, history and cache with a single click.

Clear Cache enables you to delete browsing data, such as cookies, history and cache, directly from the browser toolbar. The toolbar button can be configured to clear all browsing data with a single click, or to show a list of data types available for clearing.

Supported data types:
  • App Cache
  • Browsing history
  • Cached images and files
  • Cache storage data
  • Autofill form data
  • Download history
  • Local Storage
  • Passwords

Instructions:
1. Once Added to Chrome navigate to the icon and right click on it.
2. Select any data that you want to clear along with the time range.
3. Close the window and when ready left click on extension icon.
4. The selected data will be cleared!

Enjoy!
